meanings.definition: A person or entity that is insured.
meanings.sent1: The insurants received compensation for their damaged property.
meanings.sent2: The insurance company provides various services to its insurants.
meanings.sent3: The insurants were relieved when their insurance claim was approved.
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, insurance protects the insurants from unexpected financial losses.
meanings.sent5: The insurants felt secure knowing they were covered by a reliable insurance policy.

meanings.definition: The individuals or organizations covered by an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: All insurants must understand the terms of their insurance coverage.
meanings.sent2: The insurants can file a claim in case of any unforeseen events.
meanings.sent3: The insurants celebrated when their insurance policy saved them from a huge expense.
meanings.sent4: The insurance agent explained the benefits available to the insurants.
meanings.sent5: In times of crisis, the insurants rely on their insurance for support.
